src:
Tentang Karim Benzema, Bomber Unik Real Madrid yang Semakin Dewasa
07 Nov 2019, 06:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema menyumbang dua gol pada kemenangan 6-0 Real Madrid atas Galatasaray di Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Namun, bukan dua gol itu yang paling spesial dari diri Benzema.
Benzema tidak hanya soal mencetak gol, dia striker istimewa. Zinedine Zidane yakin striker seperti Benzema tidak banyak tersedia di dunia sepak bola saat ini. Benzema selalu memikirkan tim.
Terbukti, Rodrygo yang mencetak hattrick pada laga ini saja memuji kontribusi Benzema. Dia mengaku tidak akan bisa bermain sebaik itu jika tidak dibantu Benzema.
Seperti apa sebenarnya peran Benzema? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
About Karim Benzema, Real Madrid's Unique Bomber that is Growing Up
Nov 7 2019, 06:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema contributed two goals in Real Madrid's 6-0 victory over Galatasaray in the Champions League on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. However, those two goals were not the most special of Benzema.
Benzema isn't just about scoring goals, he's a special striker. Zinedine Zidane believes strikers like Benzema are not widely available in the world of football at this time. Benzema always thinks of the team.
Evidently, Rodrygo who scored a hat trick in this fight alone praised Benzema's contribution. He claimed he would not be able to play as well if it was not helped by Benzema.
What exactly is the role of Benzema? Read below, Bolaneters!
